title: Boutique Stay in Miami’s Coconut Grove with US$100 Spa Credit
description: Embrace laidback tropical vibes at Mr. C Coconut Grove, a boutique hotel in the heart of Miami’s prestigious Coconut Grove neighbourhood. Enjoy the buzz of the upscale restaurants, bars and clubs that dot the marina, then retreat to your hotel and pamper yourself with an incredible US$100 spa credit per room. Your escape also includes daily breakfast, the amenity fee-including exclusive access to Miami Beach through Ocean Drive, entry to the rooftop pool, bicycle hire and more-plus a lazy 2pm late checkout.
offer_address: 2988 McFarlane Rd, Miami, FL 33133, United States

title: Boutique Art Deco Escape in the Heart of Miami Beach
description:
Discover Art Deco luxury in the heart of Miami Beach at Nautilus by Arlo. Boutique design meets an impeccable location, where a short walk down a bamboo-lined path takes you straight to a private slice of South Beach with loungers, umbrellas, towels and friendly waitstaff ready to supply the food and drinks.

Your escape includes daily continental buffet breakfast at Nautilus Cabana Club, a cocktail each, US$25 hotel credit, a lazy late 1pm checkout and 20% off at the stylish onsite barbershop.

⏱**Buy now, book later**: Secure this deal now and choose your travel dates when you're ready (see Fine Print for details).
offer_address: 1825 Collins Ave, Miami Beach, FL 33139, United States

title: Miami Downtown Hidden Gem Overlooking Biscayne Bay with Daily Breakfast Credit
description:
Miami's calling and VYE Hotel is your answer. Located in the heart of the Magic City, this is your gateway to sun-drenched beaches and electric nightlife. Steps from the buzz of downtown, with sleek rooms and city skyline views, everything is designed to make your stay as smooth as a South Beach sunset. This is where your Miami dreams become reality.

When hunger strikes, Biscayne Tavern and Grill dishes out bold local flavours and pours a mean mojito. Whether you're fueling up for a day of exploring Little Havana, catching a game at Kaseya Center, hopping on a cruise or just vibing with the city's tropical energy, this hotel is perfectly positioned for every adventure.
offer_address: 146 Biscayne Boulevard, Miami, Florida 33132, United States

title: Spectacular Miami Retreat in Heart of Coconut Grove with Daily Breakfast Credit
description:
Experience the dreamy and electric nature of Miami’s Coconut Grove with an escape to Mayfair House Hotel & Garden. Make the most of your time from your charming retreat - from golden beaches and blazing nightlife to a bustling arts scene and scintillating cuisine, it’s all at your doorstep. With private balconies in all rooms and an exclusive rooftop bar, the one-of-a-kind escape is perfectly placed to admire the South Florida sunset before venturing into the magical Miami streets. 

Sizzling cuisine awaits at Mayfair Grill restaurant, offering up an array of wood-flavoured dishes reflecting the open-fire cuisine of the American Southwest. Enjoy an afternoon tipple at Sipsip Calypso Bar whose little black book is filled with island-inspired refreshments, or find a moment of respite from the heat in the artfully decorated pool.
offer_address: 3000 Florida Avenue, Coconut Grove, Florida, 33133, United States

title: Mondrian Glamour in Miami’s Sought-After South Beach
description: Mingle with the well-heeled of Miami at the seriously stylish Mondrian South Beach Hotel, located on the waterfront of Biscayne Bay with spectacular city and water views. Slip into the glamorous South Beach lifestyle, famous for its beautiful beaches and vibrant nightlife. Your stay includes daily a la carte breakfast, a complimentary cocktail each at the hotel, VIP access to the hot Bodega Night Club Lounge with a cocktail each, food and spa credits and resort privileges from complimentary watersports to high-speed Wi-Fi.
offer_address: 1100 West Ave, Miami Beach, FL 33139, USA

title: Miami Art Deco Glamour in the Heart of South Beach
description:
Soak up the Miami experience at the sophisticated Shelborne South Beach. Just metres from the world-famous strip of sand, this is a landmark property that espouses timeless luxury and elegance through restored Art Deco styling and contemporary comforts. Its iconic location means you’re just a short walk from hundreds of Miami’s best nightclubs, restaurants and attractions, with a front-row seat for a spot of South Beach people watching.

Glamour is at the heart of Shelborne South Beach, starting with the sparkling terrazzo floors and jewel-toned furniture of its lobby interiors. Order cocktails to your cabana by the palm-lined oceanfront pool, where the original diving board still takes pride of place, or hit Shelborne’s beach club. Chairs and towels are ready and waiting for day-long lounging, or you can rent jet skis and paddleboards for days out on the water. You’ll want to work up an appetite: the hotel's dining options are pleasurably plentiful. Stay by the pool for Oasis Bar and Grill or stop by The Drawing Room for cocktails that will make any hour happy.
offer_address: 1801 Collins Ave Miami Florida 33139 United States

title: Boutique Miami Retreat in Heart of Little Havana with Rooftop Restaurant
description: Kick back and relax at the effortlessly cool Life House Little Havana - a boutique Afrocuban-style retreat where expeditionist antiques meet modern glam in the heart of one of Florida's most sought-after neighbourhoods. This serene escape celebrates the city's culture, character and climate. Enjoy lazy days bathing in the Miami heat on the rooftop sunloungers, feasting on your favourites while looking out over the city at the rooftop restaurant, swinging on retro-inspired hammocks in the courtyard or exploring the array of nearby eateries, bars and boutique shopping. Adorned with exotic Caribbean plants and tropic-inspired textiles, furnishings and art, it's easy to see why the unique escape is so highly sought-after.
offer_address: 528 SW 9th Ave, Miami, FL 33130, United States

title: Boutique Miami Retreat with Private Beach Area & Rooftop Pool
description: Embrace laidback tropical vibes at Mr C Miami Coconut Grove, a stylish boutique hotel offering stunning views of the Biscayne Bay. Step inside and be awed by the unique architecture and nautical design elements before heading up to the rooftop pool to work on your tan. When hunger strikes, visit Bellini restaurant for Italian-inspired fare or enjoy savoury snacks and refreshing cocktails poolside. If you’d rather relax with your toes in the sand, take a short stroll to the beach and set yourself up in the private area reserved for Mr C guests. When you’re not exploring Coconut Grove, indulge in a relaxing treatment at the onsite spa or simply soak in the views from your private balcony.
offer_address: 2988 McFarlane Rd, Miami, FL 33133, United States

title: Stylish Miami Bayside Bliss with Beach Club & Spa
description: Experience energetic Miami at this uber-cool Mediterranean-inspired retreat, where coastal charm meets the city's vibrant spirit. Soak in the waterfront views at the onsite Baia Beach Club, complete with private cabanas, a bayside pool, a bar and a full-service wellness spa. Indulge with the rejuvenating sauna and keep up with your routine at the fitness centre. Whether you're there for a romantic escape or simply to relax, enjoy buzzing Miami at Mondrian South Beach.
offer_address: 1100 West Ave, Miami Beach, FL 33139, United States

title: Luxe Art Deco-Style Boutique Escape in the Heart of Miami Beach
description:
Kick back and relax at the stylishly restored Palihouse Miami Beach - a boutique art deco-style retreat where boho beach flair meets modern glam in the heart of one of Florida's most sought-after neighbourhoods.

It's not hard to see why this hotel was ranked within the top 10% of properties on Tripadvisor when you step inside the rooms adorned with 1940s-inspired decor and bespoke artwork. Spend your days at the sun-kissed pool with a signature cocktail from Greenbrier Swim & Social, which provides all-day outdoor dining. Feel like a VIP with the hotel's exclusive Beach Butler service where you jump in the hotel's custom-made convertible Moke for a complimentary roundtrip service to the best beach spots, with everything you need to soak up the sun, and a complimentary chilled beverage. If you prefer to do something more active, hop on the in-house bicycles and roll through Miami beach at your own pace.
offer_address: 3101 Indian Creek Drive, Miami Beach, FL 33140

title: Sophisticated Miami Doral Escape with Palm-Lined Pool & Latin-Fusion Restaurant
description: Put your finger on Miami's pulse with a stay at the InterContinental at Doral Miami, an IHG Hotel, nestled in the heart of one of South Florida's coolest districts. Spend your days lazing by the hotel's shimmering, palm-lined outdoor pool, sample flavourful Spanish-inspired plates at Blue Matisse, or delicious cocktails at the chic Nau Lounge. Head out and explore the captivating Art Deco Museum or visit the Miami Seaquarium, both a 30-minute drive away.
location_description: InterContinental at Doral Miami, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 2505 North West 87th Avenue, Doral, Florida 33172-1610, USA

title: Modern Miami Stay Steps from Brickell City Centre with Spanish Restaurant & Rooftop Pool
description: Experience the vibrancy of Miami with a stay at Hotel Indigo Miami Brickell, an IHG Hotel, just moments from the upscale boutiques of Brickell City Centre. This urban oasis is just a stone's throw from the colourful murals of Wynwood Walls and the sparkling waters of Biscayne Bay. After a day of exploration, unwind at the hotel's rooftop pool with panoramic city views, indulge in Latin-inspired dishes and a refreshing selection of beer, wine and cocktails at Mosaico Kitchen + Bar.
location_description: Hotel Indigo Miami Brickell, an IHG Hotel

title: Upscale Downtown Miami Boutique Escape with Terrace Restaurant, Rooftop Pool & Spa
description:
SLS LUX Brickell brings big Miami energy in all the right ways, offering luxe accommodations amid an urban oasis of style and indulgence. Up on the ninth floor, the Altitude rooftop pool serves skyline views with a side of craft cocktails and cabana lounging, complete with all-day dining, weekly specials and regular live DJ sets.

Located steps from Brickell centre, one of Miami's most affluent neighbourhoods, luxury shopping and dining is literally around every corner. Whether you're power-lunching with the financial district crowd or hitting Ocean Drive for chill weekend vibes, this is a true urban sanctuary that puts the entire Magic City at your fingertips.
offer_address: 805 South Miami Avenue, Miami, Florida 33130, United States

title: Miami South Beach All-Suite Beachfront Bliss with Pool Bar & Poolside Cabanas
description: Stay in the heart of Miami's vibrant South Beach at the contemporary The Sagamore Hotel South Beach. Since Miami's Art Deco era, this all-suite hotel has held onto its proud beachfront location. Fall asleep to the sounds of the ocean and wake up a few short steps from the golden sands of Miami Beach. There are four restaurants and bars onsite, including Water Lion, a wine and alchemy bar serving up personalised cocktails and artful dishes. Spend your days lounging in a poolside cabana and ordering ice-cold drinks from the bar before slipping into the pool for a refreshing dip. Heading out? Art aficionados will appreciate the year-round exhibitions showcasing the city's booming art history. Within easy reach of the resort you'll also find the high-end boutiques, buzzing bars, restaurants and museums Miami is renowned for
offer_address: 1671 Collins Ave, Miami Beach, FL 33139, United States

title: Miami Waterfront Escape on Biscayne Bay with Rooftop Pool, Cabanas & Bar
description: The glitz and glamour of Miami await at InterContinental Miami, an IHG Hotel - positioned on the downtown waterfront for the ultimate in bayside luxury. Take your time exploring the various beaches and gardens along the shoreline, before retreating for a refreshing dip in the hotel’s rooftop pool and an afternoon cocktail at Bluewater bar. Treat yourself to exquisite dining at Toro Toro, showcasing vibrant Pan-Latin cuisine, ranging from tender steaks to Peruvian ceviche.

title: Sky-High Downtown Miami Waterside Glamour with Two Rooftop Pools
description: Playful in spirit and dripping in Miami glamour, Kimpton EPIC Hotel, an IHG Hotel, offers unparalleled access to everything that makes the ‘Magic City’ so irresistible, including golden beaches, grand Art Deco architecture and truly great nightlife. After days spent discovering the city’s best, return to two spectacular, cabana-flanked rooftop pools, a sumptuous weekend seafood brunch served sky-high at Area 31 or laidback izakaya-style plates on the waterfront at Zuma.
location_description: Kimpton EPIC Hotel, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 270 Biscayne Way, Miami, Florida, 33131, United States

title: Historic Art Deco Miami Escape within South Beach Neighbourhood
description: Stay in the heart of Miami's buzzing South Beach neighbourhood at the heritage Art Deco Balfour Hotel Miami Beach. Built in the 1940s, this retreat provides an ambience of timeless style and nostalgic glamour surrounded by the electric vibrancy of Ocean Drive. Just steps from the golden sands of Miami Beach, and minutes away from high-end boutiques, buzzing bars, restaurants and museums, this serene escape couldn't be better placed for days spent in the sun.
offer_address: 350 Ocean Drive, Miami Beach, FL 33139, United States
